title: Kareena Kapoor Isn’t Happy With Taimur's Doll, Thinks It's More Like Chucky From The Horror Film
text:
View this post on Instagram
MEDIA #taimuralikhan saying asap he is getting down from car. One more PRESTIGIOUS RECOGNITION FOR US FROM EVERY ONE'S FAVORITE. You can hear all photographers are enjoying clicking #TAIMURALIKHAN
A post shared by yogen shah (@yogenshah_s) on Feb 11, 2019 at 4:07am PST
description: While Saif had earlier said he shall probably trademark Taimur’s name, Kareena recently revealed to Karan Johar on his chat show, that she isn’t happy with the Taimur doll. And rather she finds it creepy. So much so, that she said it looks more like Chucky – the killer doll. OMG!
